title: Eastern states driving clean energy transition
description: Eastern India has been witnessing rapid expansion of renewable infrastructure, supported by state initiatives such as grid strengthening, rooftop solar promotion and storage-ready planning
content:
With rising industrial demand, evolving state policies and growing interest in competitive green power, the Eastern states are set to play a pivotal role in Indias clean-energy trajectory.
